Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: This is the best bar in amsterdam, was there for 4 days and went every night, the staff were amazing and so friendly and the drinks and service was fantastic, can't wait to get back there and would recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam to pay this place a visit.

Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: Finally a decent pint, super location. Seems to have been renovated since I was here last, also new staff. Our server JP had us well looked after, will be my first stop on my next trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: Came across this place while visiting and loved the place. The decor was all updated, but what made our visit was our bartender JP. He was so friendly and is the reason we stayed for round after round. Definitely will be back when we are next in town

Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: Ordered a Prosecco and it was flat (sent it back), it was flat again.  The food was tasteless and they didn‚Äôt have enough workers to help with the guests (understaffed).

Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: I go to Amsterdam often and the experience felt here at this place was a feeling of home, our server JP made this experience possible with a friendly face and good all round banter. He also gave great advice of other places to check out throughout the city. A stop at Cafe Kooper is a must on any holiday to Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© Kooper
Review Text: Loved my time in the great bar. Right in the heart of the city centre at leisplein and the staff are the cherry in top. The bar manager Jp is an absolute gentleman and great host. Would definitely recommend stopping in for a few pints and good vibes üëç

Review Text: Been living in Amsterdam for almost 3 years now and started going to Cafe Kooper recently. Ive started making it my local because every time I drop in, I have an absolute blast. Staff are great and you can't beat the location. Great vibe all round.
